mapper.delete:
/* 디비에 쌓여있는 전체 만화책 삭제 쿼리 */
delete from web_app_test2.tb_comic_book
mapper.select:
/* 전체 만화책 리스트 조회 쿼리 */
select r_book_no as comicBookNo , m_n_no as madeNatureNo , title as comicBookTitle , author as comicBookAuthor , use_yn as comicBookUseYnEnum , left(replace(book_reg_dt, '. ', '-') ,length(replace(book_reg_dt, '. ', '-')) - 1) as comicBookRegDt , left(replace(reg_dt, '. ', '-') ,length(replace(reg_dt, '. ', '-')) - 1) as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_comic_book order by str_to_date(comicBookRegDt, '%Y-%m-%d') desc

/* 전체 만화책 리스트 조회 쿼리(pagination) */
select r_book_no as comicBookNo , m_n_no as madeNatureNo , title as comicBookTitle , author as comicBookAuthor , use_yn as comicBookUseYnEnum , left(replace(book_reg_dt, '. ', '-') ,length(replace(book_reg_dt, '. ', '-')) - 1) as comicBookRegDt , left(replace(reg_dt, '. ', '-') ,length(replace(reg_dt, '. ', '-')) - 1) as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_comic_book order by str_to_date(comicBookRegDt, '%Y-%m-%d') desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}

/* 단일 만화책 조회 쿼리 */
select r_book_no as comicBookNo , m_n_no as madeNatureNo , title as comicBookTitle , author as comicBookAuthor , use_yn as comicBookUseYnEnum , left(replace(book_reg_dt, '. ', '-') ,length(replace(book_reg_dt, '. ', '-')) - 1) as comicBookRegDt , left(replace(reg_dt, '. ', '-') ,length(replace(reg_dt, '. ', '-')) - 1) as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_comic_book where r_book_no = #{bookNo}
